text:
rain in seattle,
don't forget an umbrella,
or it will be gloom

my tunes on repeat,
it's time for me to dj,
have you heard this one?

snow is still falling,
is it time for apres yet?
let's do one more run

beep boop bop beep boop,
i am robot octocat,
i think there's a bug

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the hat

fall colors are in full glory,
so why do not we just get out?
i think it will be asweome

rain in Boston,
don't forget an umbrella,
or it will be gloom

I would like to drive to New York,
because it is lots of fun,
i think I will drive soon

Wild is the music of autumnal winds,
Amongst the faded woods,
so glad I live in a world where there are Octobers

Fall dresses up in gold,
the richest season of the soul,
carries more gold in its pocket

rain in Boston,
don't forget an umbrella,
or it will be gloom

fall colors are in full glory,
so why do not we just get out?
i think it will be asweome

fall colors are in full glory,
so why do not we just get out?
i think it will be asweome

I would like to drive to New York,
because it is lots of fun,
i think I will drive soon

Fall dresses up in gold,
the richest season of the soul,
carries more gold in its pocket
